document.full_text: the man widely seen as the leading successor to warren buffett at berkshire hathaway has resigned after buying shares in chemical company lubrizol corp before pushing buffett to acquire it.
document.title: buffett heir apparent quits after stock purchases
lines_and_colors: the man widely seen as the leading successor to warren buffett at berkshire hathaway has resigned after buying shares in chemical company lubrizol corp before pushing buffett to acquire it.
